comment: An edge of a simple graph is a proper pair, i.e. a set containing two different elements (the endvertices of the edge). Analogue of ~ usgredg2 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 23-Oct-2020.)
